dialogs.leaveMessage: Are you sure you want to leave this meeting?
dialogs.endEventMessage: This will end the event for all participants. Are you sure?
dialogs.generatingSummaryDescription: We are analyzing the event transcriptions and generating a comprehensive summary with:

aiSummary.title: AI Meeting Summary & Vocabulary
aiSummary.description: AI-generated insights from your meeting transcriptions

noSummary.title: No Summary Available
noSummary.hostDescription: Generate an AI summary from the meeting transcriptions. This will analyze conversations, extract key vocabulary, and identify action items.
noSummary.guestDescription: The host has not generated a summary for this meeting yet. Please check back later.
